message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $20,000 represents the high-end of the product's value, I understand your budget constraints.  Could you consider $17,000?  That feels like a fair compromise.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay up to $12,000 for the product. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
